summary: An eerie library filled with ancient tomes.
detail: An ethereal darkness engulfs this dreary place that seems untouched by time. Endless rows of creaky, wooden bookshelves soar high toward the ceiling, accommodating ancient tomes covered in symbols of bygone ages that still silently exhale the irony of forgotten knowledge. Shadowed by wax-covered candelabras, life awakens precariously to amazement while the subtle whispers of hard-earned truths claw their way between written folios.

expression.content: You sense the presence of a mighty power from one of the old tomes on the bookshelves.

You cautiously take off the old tome from the shelf, titled 'The Lamia's Lament'. Amid its decaying pages tells the ultimate doom of proud kindred befallen by their own lust for power. What unforeseeable insight...

Vampire Vlad slowly creeps from the shadowy corner like wind through tombstones, his crimson eyes paving the merciless truth of a cold eternity. 'Mortal intruder,' utters Vlad without affection, 'I see you're curious too... in perusing this forbidden tome, have you ventured down a one-way path to enigma like yours truly?'

You close your eyes and focus on the soft whispers that seemed muffled behind the veil of reality. Your mind reels as the voices clear up to reveal ancient incantations seeking masterful performers. The weight of untold arcane spells strikes your heart wearily.
